summary: Provides a Metaflow step decorator that configures and launches steps as AWS Batch jobs, managing container images, compute resources, IAM roles, job queue settings, metadata synchronization, sidecar processes, and multiâ€‘node environment preparation.
business_intent: Enable Metaflow users to run workflow steps on AWS Batch with automatic handling of cloud resources, containerization, and execution environment, facilitating scalable and reproducible data pipelines.
